programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Three lifelong friends get wrapped up in a robbery-arson case. Suspicious of the investigation and the police, Hyun-tae starts digging for the truth himself and asks his best friend for help.

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the world's most legendary con man.

programme.title: Officer Of The Year
programme.desc: The competition to see who makes the most arrests heats up between two cops from rival stations when they're forced to work together to catch a criminal.

programme.title: Decision To Leave
programme.desc: When detective Hae-Joon investigates the death of a man who fell from a mountaintop and meets his wife Seo-rae, he starts to suspect her at the same time that he begins feeling an attraction to her.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Ordinary Person
programme.desc: Sung-jin is a police officer involved in a conspiracy after he arrested a suspected murderer by chance. Gyu-nam exploits Sung-jin's weakness, his family, to strike a deal with him.

programme.title: The Hot-Blooded
programme.desc: 4 friends gave up on Taekwondo and part ways after being asked to lose on purpose in a trial. Years later, they decided to take on a local gang realizing their hometown is threatened.

programme.title: Hijack 1971
programme.desc: The detonation of an explosive device causes terror on the flight, and pilot Gyu-Sik loses sight in one eye. Yong-dae, who hatched the hijacking plot, threatens to take the plane to North Korea.

programme.title: In Our Prime
programme.desc: Genius Mathematician defected from the North tried to hide his past eventually started teaching a student who gave up on Maths the right way to find the answer.

programme.title: Single In Seoul
programme.desc: Yeong-Ho is a famous influencer who praises living a single life. Hyeon-Jin is an editor who is desperate about finding her partner. The two meets while working together for a book.

programme.title: Sinkhole
programme.desc: As the family celebrates their purchases of a new condo after 11 years of effort, the building was engulfed in a sinkhole due to heavy downpour.

programme.title: Marriage Blue
programme.desc: The misadventures of 4 couples a week before their wedding.

programme.title: Yoga
programme.desc: Hyo-jung is insecure about her appearance. She joined the yoga academy wishing to restore beauty, yet strange things begin to unfold...

programme.title: Swing Kids
programme.desc: The story of a North Korean soldier who joined the tap dancing team "Swing Kids" in the Geoje prison camp during the Korean War.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: Se-yeon, devoted her entire life to her family, suddenly learns she is gravely ill. Now she is determined to live for herself more than ever and looks for her first love with the help of her husband.

programme.title: 12.12: The Day
programme.desc: Based on the 12.12 Military Insurrection. Chun Doo-Gwang staged a coup. Lee Tae-Shin is a commander who fights against Chun. The chaos led Seoul to an unexpected direction.

programme.title: My Puppy
programme.desc: A groom-to-be sets off with his friend to finding a new owner for his puppy.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep133
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep146
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: Taste of Life Ep135
programme.desc: Chu-Tsai Chao and his wife have five children. Having devoted his entire life to developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai sincerely hopes that one of his children will follow in his footsteps and take over the family business. However, he also respects their individual passions and aspirations. Because of their fathers dream of innovation, the lives of the Chao brothers are about to change.

There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. <Stylish Man The Chef> containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Blessing of Formosa Ep296
programme.desc: The beauty of folklore is all around us in Taiwan, but we often overlook it and fail to appreciate and feel it. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan Ep52
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2056
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep148
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5186
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: Ip Man 3
programme.desc: When some gangsters led by a ruthless American property developer force a school to sell their land, Ip Man fights to protect it. Subsequently, Ip Man is challenged by another Wing Chun master Zhang Tian Zhi for the Grandmaster title. Ip Man accepts the challenge for the sake of his family and disciples, and wins the duel for the title.

programme.title: HK Lan Kwai Fong
programme.desc: Lee is the Production head of an advertising firm who tries to improve her teams performance by competing with Creative head Chan in the day and clubbing at Lan Kwai Fong for ideas at night. Lee runs into her ex-boyfriend before a big commercial shoot and drowns her sorrows drinking at Lan Kwai Fong, but finally picks herself up with Chans help.

programme.title: Mr & Mrs Gambler
programme.desc: Manfred and Flora are gambling addicts who have come across each other a few times at the casino, but do not leave impression on each other until they both suffer heavy losses and are held hostage by the loan sharks in Macau. They find themselves falling in love, and decide to get married when they come back to Hong Kong.

programme.title: All's Well End's Well 2009
programme.desc: Successful businesswoman Yu Chu has no chance of finding a husband with her insufferable personality, much to the consternation of her younger brother Yu Bo, who due to a curse, will fail in love until his sister gets married. Yu Bo hires a love expert, Dick, to woo his sister. Smitten at first sight, Yu Chu is not about to let Dick get away...

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: From Beijing With Love
programme.desc: Stephen Chow writes, directs & stars in this hilarious James Bond spoof that sees the Chinese government assign their worst secret agent (Chow) to recover a stolen dinosaur skull.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: Trouble Girl
programme.desc: Xiao Xiao suffers from ADHD and faces bullying in school. Her mother sees her as a troublemaker, while her father toils abroad. The only solace comes from her empathetic teacher, Paul. During a typhoon, Xiao Xiao discovers a secret between her mother and Paul, unravelling complex emotions and shared helplessness in life.

programme.title: The Ex-Files 4: Marriage Plan
programme.desc: Two brothers, Meng Yun and Yu Fei, are of marriageable age and are facing challenges in love. Yun dodges family pressure to marry after his breakup, while Fei and his girlfriend opt for a marriage cooling-off period to tackle marriage issues.

programme.title: Hell Hole
programme.desc: The movie features three horror stories in different era: a pregnant woman haunted by a ghost sacrifices her life to save her baby; a boy commits suicide after being bullied by four medical students and his spirit returns for revenge; some company staff are haunted after they open a box of used clothes, releasing a more than 20-year resentment.

programme.title: From Vegas To Macau II
programme.desc: Mark, the chief accountant of a money-laundering syndicate, has stolen US$15 billion from the fund and absconded to Thailand with his daughter. Interpol agent Lok seeks help from Ken, the God of Gamblers, to capture the syndicates mastermind. As they search for Mark to testify in the case, Ken reunites with the love of his life

programme.title: Prosecutor, The
programme.desc: Based on a true case, young Ma Jia Jie pleads guilty to drug trafficking in exchange for a lighter sentence, as coerced by his defense lawyer. Huo Zi Hao, a former cop turned prosecutor, believes in his innocence and launches an investigation. Risking his life and career, Huo is determined to uncover the real perpetrator.

programme.title: Only Cloud Knows
programme.desc: This romantic drama is based on the story of a real-life couple. It follows a grieving husband as he journeys to places of significance to his beloved dead wife across their New Zealand homeland.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich mans son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Everything Under Control
programme.desc: During a diamond heist, one of the security escorts, Jelly, steals the diamonds and flees. Fellow security escorts, Yau Shing and Penguin, are forced to help the robber track down the diamonds. They stumble onto a remote village along the way, encountering strange villagers and mysterious incidents. Can they finally locate Jelly and the diamonds?

programme.title: Song of the Assassins
programme.desc: A young assassin is assigned his first mission while secretly investigating the cause of his familys massacre years ago. While taking on the mission, he finds himself entangled in a political conspiracy that was planned for years and has to use his skills as an assassin to solve whatever comes his way.

programme.title: Marriage With A Liar
programme.desc: Kiki and her boyfriend of seven years, Sean, are to be married in a week but both cheated on each other three days before the wedding. Faced with each of their perfect partners, Kiki and Sean ignore their responsibilities to each other and choose to go their separate ways

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Stand Up Story
programme.desc: Mancer knows his father Wah is intellectually challenged since young and has to take care of him after his mother left them. When Mancer discovers and finds solace in stand-up comedy, he learns that hardships provide the best comedic material - from his own school ridicule experience to pandemic woes, misery can fuel laughter!

programme.title: The Unwavering Brotherhood
programme.desc: The revered elder of a triad gang faces succession uncertainty when his three trusted underlingsHua, Fei, and Guoare robbed while transporting gang money. Determined to redeem himself, Hua vows to track down the robbers. However, when Hua discovers that Fei and Guo are connected to the robbery, he must choose between loyalty and brotherhood.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: The Mask of Shura of Fire Cloud
programme.desc: 18 years ago, the evil Black Feather clan infiltrated the territory of Master Fire Cloud and stole The Mask of Shura, thus releasing an evil spirit that was a baby. Master Fire Cloud adopted the baby to prevent him from becoming evil. When the baby grows up, he takes control of the mask and becomes Fire Clouds successor as the citys guard.

programme.title: Wu Xia
programme.desc: Martial artist Liu hides his identity and lives in a remote village with his wife Ah Yu and their two sons, but somehow gets embroiled in a bizarre murder case. Constable Xu is a kung fu fanatic, whose curiosity forces Liu into a death duel with the Sect Leader of the 72 Demons, and puts Lius family and homeland in a great danger...

programme.title: I Did It My Way
programme.desc: As the secretive, complex world of online drug trafficking increasingly targets Hong Kong, the police launches a risky and top-secret sting operation to bring down one of the most notorious drug lords in Asia.

programme.title: I Fine Thank You Love You
programme.desc: Pleng, an English tutor, helps her student to pass a break up message in English to her boyfriend Gym. Gym knows nothing about English but wants to win back his girlfriend from the US, so he asks Pleng to teach him. Boorish and a slow learner, Gym makes many hilarious mistakes when learning English and ends up falling for Pleng.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: Set in 2020 during the outbreak of COVID-19, the movie features interconnected stories of three women's lives as they navigate the uncertain future amongst their respective friends and families. From the struggles at home to challenges in relationships and conflicts at work, these three women rise with strength when faced with plights unknown.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel.

programme.title: Stuntman
programme.desc: Washed-up stunt director Li Sen is offered the role of action choreographer on his director friends final film. Bringing along an ambitious young stuntman, the two generations risk everything to stage a comeback. As Li Sen battles his fierce temper and past mistakes, he also strives to mend his relationship with his estranged daughter.

programme.title: Legally Declared Dead
programme.desc: Insurance agent Sean visits Tak and Ling's home to follow up on a case and is shocked to see their son's corpse hanging above him. He suspects them of murdering their son to claim the insurance money and decides to launch his own investigation. As he becomes obsessed over their guilt, his kind nature is used against him by the real perpetrator.

programme.title: The Knight Of Knights
programme.desc: Wen Su Chen, the leader of seven knights, sends his six sworn brothers to investigate a monastery. Unfortunately, they are killed by an abbot who plans to murder Inspector Lin. Wen saved Lin and battles the abbot to avenge his dead sworn brothers. With Lin and his army's help, they bring down the ruthless monks in the monastery.

programme.title: The House Of 72 Tenants
programme.desc: The 72 inhabitants of a dilapidated tenement live under the thumb of a heartless landlady and her sleazy husband. The arrival of a defiant new tenant however, changes their fate. The residents pool their resources together to prevent evictions, deflect targeted harassment by a corrupt policeman and ultimately prevent their home from being sold.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: The Brave Archer
programme.desc: On his way back to the midlands, Guo Jing meets Huang Rong and they quickly fall in love. However, Ouyang Ke proposes to marry Huang Rong at the same time, so Huang's father sets up a duel for the two men to compete for her hand. Guo Jing finally beats Ouyang Ke to win Huang Rong back.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung travels incognito to Jiangnan to review his people's livelihood but soon discovers that corrupt officials are oppressing his people. The emperor meets an upright young man and they join hands to teach the corrupt officials a lesson. The young man was appointed as his bodyguard thereafter.

programme.title: Brave Archer And His Mate
programme.desc: Guo Jing and Huang Rong raise the son of his sworn brother Yang Kang and named him Yang Guo. To prevent Yang Guo from taking revenge for his father's death, Huang Rong bans him from learning martial arts. Yang Guo runs away from home in anger and encounters Ouyang Feng, who teaches him the Toad Stance and accidentally unveils his true identity

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: Finger Of Doom
programme.desc: The protagonists are ex-swordmasters who now find joy in making umbrellas. They track down the evil Madame Kung Sun and her poisonous Finger of Doom, a unique supernatural power which allows her to transform normal, everyday people into horrifying zombies, and this is just the start of their mythical adventure against this zombie maker!

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperor's death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Silver Fox
programme.desc: The formidable swordswoman Silver Fox was a child when her father was senselessly wounded by his step brother, and her mother raped. It is payback time eighteen years later, as her father trains her up with kung fu to take revenge on his behalf.

programme.title: The Shaolin Avengers
programme.desc: Hu seeks to avenge his father who is being killed by the White-Browed Hermit and his gang. However, he fails in his attempt and is saved by Fang Shi Yu, a youth from Shaolin whose parents are also killed by the same villains. They learn and master the advanced Shaolin style kung fu, before Fang leads Hu and the Shaolin fellows to fight the enemies.

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung goes incognito to mix with his people and understand their needs. He encounters many strange things along the way, including being arrested and nearly beheaded. Who will save him?

programme.title: The Battle Wizard
programme.desc: Dali Prince Tuan Yu knows nothing about martial arts, but leaves the palace for the martial arts world. He meets a snake sorceress and his mysterious half-sister. Through various misadventures, Tuan Yu gains invincible power by sucking the cobra's blood and swallowing the magic toad, eventually defeating his father's old rival.

programme.title: The Mad Monk Strikes Again
programme.desc: The Mad Monk is up against the equally legendary scholar-turned-genie, Lu Tung Pin. The duo create havoc as they vie with each other, be it in mirth, magic, women or weapons!

programme.title: The Fighting Fool
programme.desc: Famous Kung Fu Pole master Red Eagle, is kidnapped by a villain one day. His disciple Meng, vows to rescue him. On his way, Meng encounters a greedy but great martial artist who agrees to join him in the rescue. Even though the two have extremely different personalities, they manage to team up and fight the villain in a final showdown.

programme.title: Na Cha The Great
programme.desc: Adapted from a chapter of the classic Chinese legend Investiture of the Gods, this is the story of Na Cha set 3000 years ago. After Na Cha sacrificed his life to save his parents, he is reincarnated with his spirit embodied in a lotus flower and is armed with two magic weapons to save the people from their despotic emperor.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: The Bride Napping
programme.desc: A rich girl Yue Ying, together with her maid Chun Lan, encounter a poor scholar Bian Ji at a fte. Chun Lan realizes Yue Ying is in love with him, but mixes his identity with a bandit due to an old servant's confusion, threatening the couple's union. After a series of complications, misunderstandings and mismatches, Chun Lan finally saves the day.

programme.title: The Avenging Eagle
programme.desc: Qi Ming Xing, an assassin of the Iron Boat Clan, decides to quit the clan. When hunted by the clan, he is saved by Swordsman Zhuo Yi Fan. Zhuo accidentally discovers that Qi is the killer of his wife, but forgives him after knowing Qi's guilt over her death. The two finally team up to destroy the evil clan.

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: The story revolves around three lay disciples of the Shaolin Temple: Fang Shi Yu, Hong Xi Guan, and Hu Hui Qian. Monk Jie instructs them in martial arts, but their frequent competitions with fellow disciple Wu Qing spark rivalries. The once serene Shaolin Temple is plunged into chaos, yet even the abbot cannot help but be amused by their antics.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Grand Substitution
programme.desc: In this Opera epic, a loyal Imperial Court servant gives up his own newborn son to save the prince from an evil official.

programme.title: Rolls, Rolls, I Love You
programme.desc: Three young men offend a billionaire and are drawn into a high stakes bet. If they win, they get to keep the billionaire's Rolls Royce. Otherwise, they will need to pay the rich man fifty thousand dollars! Will the underdogs win the bet?

programme.title: Torrent Of Desire
programme.desc: Rich playboy David is a drunk until he falls in love with a fashion model Dan Feng and marries her. David's sister Mona is in love with his best friend Han Ming, who rejected her as he secretly loves Dan Feng as well. Out of jealousy and hatred, Mona lies to David about a fake affair between Han Ming and Dan Feng...

programme.title: Dead End
programme.desc: Uninhibited youth Chun meets a rich girl Wen when her car breaks down and drives her home. Chun falls in love with Wen but Wen's brother dislikes him and forbids his sister to see him. He humiliates Chun and gets Chun beaten up, so Chun takes the pistol he has found accidentally on the street to Wen's home and shoots her brother dead.

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: Boxer Rebellion
programme.desc: The Empress Dowager Cixi believes the Boxers' claim that they have developed a kung fu that makes them impervious to weapons, thus declaring war against the alliances of eight foreign nations. The lack of weapons and good leadership in the Ching government allows the Eight Nation Alliances to take down Beijing.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: Poor student Lin is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises him because of his family's declining status. Lin visits his fiance before leaving for the Imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lin's bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: Emperor Chien Lung And The Beauty
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung meets a famous courtesan in Suzhou and in order to spend as much time as possible with her, he builds a direct underground tunnel into the Forbidden City. The emperor's sudden appearances through this direct access shock his people but it is also at this time that he helps the needy and cracks the gambling business in Suzhou.

programme.title: The Black Lizard
programme.desc: Young swordsman Lung Fei encounters strange omens portending the death of his fianc. His enquiries with the help of Chief Constable Tieh Hu reveal an astounding story, in this tale of men and women struggling to save their true loves.

programme.title: Dawn Will Come
programme.desc: Liang Cai drugged the beautiful Qiu Rong and raped her, but promised to marry her after getting his parent's consent. Since then, there is no news of his proposal and Qiu Rong confronts Liang Cai when she finds herself pregnant. This is when she discovers that he has already married a rich noble girl and even plans to kill her

programme.desc: London Hughes, Fortune Feimster and Bobby Berk - Hosted by Pat Sajak and Vanna White, they take us on a star-studded spin by welcoming celebrities to spin the world's most famous Wheel and solve puzzles for a chance to win more than one million dollars.

programme.title: Survivor S49 Ep2
programme.desc: Survivor celebrates its 25th anniversary with new Survivor-to-bes hitting the beaches of Fiji in pursuit to outwit, outplay and outlasts for the grand prize.

programme.title: Fear Thy Neighbor S9 Ep13

programme.title: American Ninja Warrior S15 Ep9

programme.title: Elsbeth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Reality Shock - When a larger-than-life reality TV star is found dead in her bathtub, Elsbeth and Kaya investigate the circumstances around her death to determine if it was an accident or murder.

programme.title: Rookie: Feds, The S1 Ep16
programme.desc: For Love And Money - It's Valentine's Day, and love is in the air. The FBI teams up with LAPD to take down a shady Casanova linked to a notorious drug lord. While the rest of the team celebrates with their new loves, Simone connects with someone new.

programme.title: Wipeout S9 Ep12

programme.desc: A look at how some foods are made in food factories. This episode looks at factories producing cola, pickled beetroot, swiss rolls and yoghurt.

programme.title: Food Factory S3 Ep24
programme.desc: See billions of Sixlets candies, or the 40,000 heads of cabbage to make 400,000 Zarky's cabbage rolls. Plus American Farmer sweet and salty popcorn is popped, and TGI Friday and Indenture Foods potato skins chips look deli fresh.

programme.title: Wild Scandinavia S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Heartlands - Magical forests wrap around a labyrinth of waterways in Scandinavia's heartlands. Here, lynxes, wolves and reindeer survive the ever-changing seasons through surprising alliances.

programme.title: Simon Reeve's South America S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Simon Reeve travels through the remote and little-visited north east of South America, from Venezuela to French Guiana.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S4 Ep9
programme.desc: Series 4 - In Nepal, heavy snow creates a treacherous situation for trekkers in the Himalayan mountains, when an earthquake triggered avalanche sweeps into a busy base camp. In Pennsylvania, good Samaritans rush to save three children trapped inside a semi-submerged car.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S11 Ep6
programme.desc: From Here to There - Alaskans test their will and luck against Dark Winter's obstacles.

programme.title: Great Blue Wild S2 Ep8
programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean's top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ultimate Predator - Stalk the seas with sharks as they hunt using heightened senses and killer instincts. Watch a whitetip reef shark put its electrical sensors to work finding its prey's heartbeat, and the pelagic thresher shark stun its quarry with its whiplike tail.

programme.title: Planet Shark S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Ocean Voyagers - Navigate the ocean's vast distances, depths, and darkness with nomadic sharks that thrive in the blue emptiness. Meet a lone blue shark traversing stormy Atlantic seas, and hundreds of hammerheads returning to their Pacific island breeding ground.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Life Givers - Learn how bees, butterflies, moths, and other pollinators keep our fields and forests fruitful, and weigh what life would be like if these busy bugs vanished. Witness a mysterious butterfly pilgrimage and a moth's clever way of escaping hungry bats.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Change in the Air - Watch life on the farm adjust as the leaves start to turn, from the sheep whose woolly coats keep them warm during the first frost to the bees that feed on the last bit of nectar before hibernation.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Hunkering Down - Winter is coming, and the animals take advantage of autumn's final bounty before the cold, barren months ahead. Watch some creatures search for respite indoors, while others arrive from far northern climates to settle in the ploughed fields.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Body Language - Join researchers as they study how animals communicate. Find out how wolves use their body language to unite the pack and maintain a sophisticated social structure, and see the astounding number of gestures chimps use to communicate.

programme.desc: Costa Rica - Shark Defenders - The Pacific coast of Costa Rica is a biodiversity hotspot that hosts nearly 5,000 species of marine life. But here in this undersea jungle, the ocean's top predator is at risk. Discover how marine defenders are teaming up to save the shark.

programme.title: Strange Creatures S2 Ep1
programme.desc: Chemical Weapons - Keep your distance from these natural-born killers. Armed with venom and other poisonous tools that make hunting easier (and escape impossible), nudibranches, cuttlefish, giant centipedes, and assassin bugs are all dressed to kill.

programme.title: Wild Tales From The Farm S1 Ep3

programme.title: Dawn To Dusk S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher's pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rumble in the Jungle - Tune into the natural world and explore frequencies beyond human hearing, like the gentle hum of giraffes in the evening, or creatures who use song to claim territory on a seemingly silent coral reef.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Dragon Mountain: Surviving the Summit - South Africa's Drakensberg is one of the continent's most impressive landscapes. It is home to sharp climatic and ecological gradients as physical conditions change for both land-based creatures and the Raptors that swirl in the skies above.

programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Deep In The Heart
programme.desc: Take a journey through the eyes of catfish, ocelots, and other native creatures with narrator Matthew McConaughey. Celebrate the Lone Star State's landscapes and wildlife, and learn how crucial conservation efforts can save Texas' unique habitats.

programme.title: Turtle Beach
programme.desc: Locals call it the 'arribada', or 'arrival'. The magical days and nights when tens of thousands of sea turtles come ashore in Costa Rica, to lay millions of eggs.

programme.title: Animals Decoded S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Invisible Signals - Could undiscovered animal languages save some of our most endangered species? From subtle scents to colors that are invisible to the human eye, uncover the hidden ways creatures communicate, which scientists are only starting to understand.

programme.title: Extreme Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lake Manyara National Park - In north Tanzania, towering mountains line a dramatic valley. Enriched by ancient volcanoes, its slopes provide a variety of habitats for life to thrive and its great centerpiece holds water through even the driest of times.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep3
programme.desc: The Partners - Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teacher's pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs S1 Ep4
programme.desc: The Protectors - A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.title: Bugs That Rule The World S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Beetle Mania - Get a sanitation lesson from nature's original cleanup crew. Learn how beetles keep ecosystems in balance with clever biological weapons like tusks and toxic sprays, then see why the 6,000-plus species of dung beetles are the world's unsung heroes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep21
programme.desc: She Said, She Said / Starfish - When one of Rikkis plants won't sing, Pixie and Juniper both tell their varying recollections of why the plant is suddenly silent. / Kelp, Scallop, and Cruz have always thought that starfish did nothing but laze about; but as they go about their day, the starfish goes through his own routine, completely unbeknownst to everyone else.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep22
programme.desc: Leroys Caterpillar / Lost Spark - Leroy must learn to let go when his caterpillar friend turns into a butterfly. / When Pixie loses her spark, Kelp and Juniper look for the plant they think will cure her. Meanwhile Pixie wonders whether she can be cured at all!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep15
programme.desc: Luck - A goblin turns Puss into a black cat, setting off a chain of bad luck, and Puss must leave San Lorenzo to try to lift the curse.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep16
programme.desc: Dragon - Puss vows to slay a dragon that is terrorizing nearby towns, but when he discovers it's a sickly baby dragon, he decides to bring it back home.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep16
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Harmful Horrors of the Harrowing Hiveschool - After injecting all the teachers with bee DNA, the Melvins run the new "hivemind" of the school. But Ms. Ribble is accidently injected with too much "Bee- NA" and becomes the queen bee, overpowering the Melvins' control. George, Harold and the recently re-hired Vice Principal Krupp must work with the Melvins and stop her from turning everyone into her Zombees.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep15
programme.desc: Lucky And The New Governor - The girls plans to attend the Governors Ball are waylaid when they save a pregnant horse.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep16
programme.desc: Lucky And The Risky Rescue - When a Tuckapaw boy is unfairly arrested, Lucky and her friends plan to break him out of jail.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep15
programme.desc: Pete The Polar Bear - Pete the Polar Bear shows up for a vacation on MerCats sunny beach. Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats show Pete he can have a great vacation, even if things dont go precisely to plan.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep16
programme.desc: Kitty Rangers - Kitty Ranger Team Leader Mama Box helps Kitty Ranger Gabby and Pandy get a lost Baby Me-Owl back home to its Mama in the Fairy Tale Garden. They embark on a hiking adventure! They learn about animal tracking, earn patches along the way, and ultimately, reunite Baby with Mama!

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep38
programme.desc: Yellow 100 - Finally promoted to CEO, Boss Baby sets his sights on achieving 100% Baby Love, while dealing with the annoying Puppies and Preeks who rented Baby Corp office space while Boss was gone. Tim and Danny become local heroes after saving a baby's life.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep39
programme.desc: Pyg & Tam - Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep40
programme.desc: Conference Room B - Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep14
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Tenuous Takedown of the Tyrannical Teachertrons - In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep13
programme.desc: Straycation Part II - While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep1
programme.desc: Sticky Business - Struggling to find their purpose on the Betterman farm, the Croods see an opportunity to prove their worth by harvesting Phils perilous (and sticky) bounceberries.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep11
programme.desc: Wu You Gonna Call? - After the reveal of magical creatures existence and Yis magic ability in at the end of Season 1, the citys citizens are unsure how to feel about this new revelation. A popular vlogger, Bryan Wu, sets out to capture viral-worthy footage of creatures and magic, under the guise of helping Yi and her friends get out their creature awareness message. Yi and the crew must step in when Bryan puts himself and creatures alike in peril in his pursuit of clickbait.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep12
programme.desc: The Ditch Sitch - The crew gets their first ping on their new creature-helping app! A dried up jellyfish-type creature has been discovered at a construction site, and the anti-creature contractor wants it GONE. The crew try taking Jelleen to the sewers to live with Sewer Koi, but the unhappy creature creates a blackout in the sewers with its magical electric charge. Realizing that Jelleen should be able to stay in her original home, the crew must stand up against the contractor and force her to see the error of her ways or else!

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep13
programme.desc: Tales from the Fox's Tails - When a mysterious creature keeps stealing peoples prized possessions, the crew discovers the Nine-Tailed Fox, a trickster rooted in Chinese lore. Unbeknownst to Yi, she is taken on a realm-bending journey by NTF so that the Fox might pry away Yis prized violin. The crew eventually comes back together and realizes that NTF takes items people think they need to be happy. Yi was able to hold onto her violin because it truly does make her happy and is a fundamental part of who she is.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep9
programme.desc: Dragons of the Undead - When Feather is taken by a group of what appear to be zombie dragons, Alex finds her inner hero and rescues her friend.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep10
programme.desc: Downpour - Tom and Thunder train a new species of aggressive tidal dragons to help the other riders put out a forest fire threatening ICARIS.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep11
programme.desc: The Tangled Web - Tom and DAngelo must come together to help Alex and Jun escape the clutches of the Spiderwings.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Disturbing Dilemma Of The Dysfunctional Doppelgangers - The crew meets their blue-hued doppelgngers when they crash-land on an alien planet where kids call all the shots.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what hes been missing real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldnt be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eeps traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isnt until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes its time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Catastrophe - During an attempt to get displaced Fire Gronckles back to their native Fire Realm, DAngelo makes a mistake by accidentally feeding them Catastrophic Quaken eggs.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep5
programme.desc: Big Man On Berk - Thinking he's allergic to Meatlug, Fishlegs gets hypnotized and wakes up transformed into an invincible warrior known as Thor Bonecrusher.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep11
programme.desc: Heather Report Part II - Hiccup and the gang infiltrate the outsiders in order to free Heathers parents.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep31
programme.desc: Toddle-Lu, Mexico City - Odlulu wants her own quinceaera, a traditional Mexican celebration for a girl's 15th birthday, so she uses the Grow-Up Key to skip ahead a few years. But the key backfires and turns her into a toddler! Fritz must babysit Toddler Odlulu as she wanders through Mexico City, all while Wally and Wenda try to retrieve the Grow-Up Key and get Odlulu back to her normal age

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep18
programme.desc: Daddy Julien - King Julien believes Mort is the son he never knew he had despite the fact that Mort is two years older than him.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep7
programme.desc: Eep-Over / Thunkytown - When Eep has the first-ever sleepover, scary noises and shadows send the girls screaming out of the cave; Thunk saves the day when Bear Owls invade.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep5
programme.desc: Lucky And The Appaloosa Adventure - Lucky Spirit and Turo team up to help save an abused horse

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep5
programme.desc: Pit - D-Structs traps the Dinotrux in a deep sinkhole pit but he overlooks tiny Revvit, who comes up with a plan to help his much-bigger friends.

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep5
programme.desc: Return Of The Gladiator - A Voltron-Sized Robot Beast attacks Planet Arus. While Voltron defends the innocent inhabitants, Shiro searches for answers about his lost time as a Galra captive.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep9
programme.desc: Turbo Drift - The snails and Tito travel to Tokyo to film a commercial and Turbo is challenged to a drift race against a beautiful and mysterious female cricket.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep10
programme.desc: Ready, Set, Glow / Breakneck's Back - In order to investigate one of Skidmark's conspiracy theories, Turbo and Skid join a dangerous underground zip line race/The crew is surprised when Whiplash enters the town's annual Tomato Games. Turbo discovers that Whiplash is really trying to keep an eye on an untrustworthy snail who is Whiplash's former mentor.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep21
programme.desc: DJ's Glow Ride - Gabby receives a special nighttime delivery, unboxing a glow-in-the-dark train engine. However, she realizes that she's missing the other three train cars to complete the whole train. The Gabby Cats help Gabby build the other three glow-in-the-dark train cars by creating shapes through interactive/musical games. In our Gabby Cat of the Day Segment, DJ Catnip sings a song.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep22
programme.desc: Rainy Day Banana - With a little help from Gabbys imagination, a sparkly toy banana turns into a magical Rainy Day Banana that helps Gabby and the Gabby Cats have fun on a rainy day! They have silly banana snacks with Cakey, make crafts to tell a story with Baby Box, and have an a-meow-zing banana dance party with DJ Catnip. For our Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Cakey sings a song!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep19
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Shadowy Syndrome of the Sinister Splotch - Captain Underpants becomes a wanted man in underwear when footage surfaces of a robber who looks exactly like him. George and Harold, positive it's an impostor, try to track down the perp and bring him to justice. But can the boys do this before Captain Underpants is found guilty?

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In The Crib Ep68
programme.desc: Poompf! - Crispin Biscuits frames Boss and Tinas startup company for exploding baby Iggys favorite stuffed animal, and Tina is forced to the sidelines to avoid any more bad press. As Crispin expands his plan to burst all the plush toys in the neighborhood, Tina discovers she can stop this by breaking open and rewiring a single toy doll. Unfortunately that doll is Baby Corps current head honcho, Pull-String CEO Baby.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep12
programme.desc: Straycation Part I - The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along theyre so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNais stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that hes possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Pengs body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep16
programme.desc: Empty Fireworm Nest - When a tiny Fireworm dragon ends up at ICARIS, Alex has to decide between her moms excitement and keeping the dragon secret.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep12
programme.desc: The Party Games / Trolly Tales - Everyone gets excited because its time for the Trolls Annual funbased Party GamesPoppy and Branch try to convince the Troll kids that the library is fun.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - Its Pandys birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him its even better now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep17
programme.desc: Harmony Harbor's Holiday Surprise - When the townsfolk decorate the Harmony Harbor holiday tree but lose the treetop star, TZG secretly search for it in the yard of a notoriously scary house. / When it transpires the house is not-so-scary after all and belongs to shy inventor Dr. Greenlittle, TZG secretly leads her to the big Harmony Harbor sing-along so that she doesn't have to spend the holiday alone.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep18
programme.desc: The Big Sleep-Walk / Of Course You Can - When Ian starts to sleepwalk around Harmony Harbor, TZG secretly guides him back to his own bed where he can continue sleeping safely. / When Felicia wants to run an obstacle course for the first time but is afraid shell embarrass herself, TZG secretly boosts her confidence by helping with practice.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep23
programme.desc: Spark Bees / Best in Show - The kids scare away a swarm of bees. But when they realize bees make the flowers happy, they hatch a plan to get them back! / When Scallop makes a bad choice, Kelp helps her learn from her mistakes.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal Ep24
programme.desc: Superfan / Barb - Kelp and the rest of his friends put on a game of rainbow ball, but Kelp begins to wonder how well his special spark can help him truly measure up to his favorite player. / When the underwater friends meet someone new, theyre reminded that their differences make them unique.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep17
programme.desc: Moles - Jack Sprat and Puss journey underground in search of treasure and discovery a kingdom of moles led by a rather bizarre king.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep18
programme.desc: Mermaid - To prove he's a ladies' man, Puss rescues a mermaid, who instantly falls in love with him and becomes his worst nightmare

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep17
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Preposterous Pulverizing of the Pestering Poopacabra - In hopes of raising their grades so they can go to Lake Summer Camp, George and Harold must teach Ratrick, their assigned rat, a simple task. But Ratrick runs away into the sewers where he is doused with toxic waste and transformed into Poopacabra! It's now up to the boys and Captain Underpants to stop the beast before it takes over Piqua with its stench, and more importantly, ruins the boys' chances to go to Lake Summer Camp.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep18
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Dastardlys Deed of the Devious Diddlysaurus - George and Harold decide to do an extra credit project on dinosaurs to help their chances of getting summer camp-worthy grades. When Melvin brings in a dinosaur frozen in ice, the boys try to get rid of it. But the ice thaws and they meet Diddlysaurus, a prankster raptor who's huge fans of the boys. He offers to help them with their project if he can pull pranks with them, but when the pranks go too far, the boys and Captain Underpants have to deal with the dino.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep17
programme.desc: Lucky And The Field Trip Fraud - Lucky is determined to shed her reputation as teachers pet on the class field trip.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep18
programme.desc: Lucky And The Shaky Day - When an earthquake takes out the railroad bridge, the PALs must find a way to stop the oncoming train which Jim is aboard

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep17
programme.desc: Meow-Mazing Games - When Gabby, Pandy, and Carlita prepare for the annual Meow-Mazing Games, they encounter stiff competition from the Doodads and must work together to bring home the coveted dollhouse trophy.

programme.title: Gabby'S Dollhouse Ep18
programme.desc: Pandy's Birthday - Its Pandys birthday!! The dollhouse is throwing a surprise party for him! Gabby goes room to room preparing all his favorite things for the party, but when the big moment comes, Pandy drops his cake! Gabby consoles him and tells him its even better now, they have smash cake! They all hold up a piece and pose for a picture.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep41
programme.desc: Game Plan - Boss tries to rename the local soccer team to "The Babies", but after Danny gets involved in the popularity race with his name, "The Hot Dogs", the town becomes divided. Boss creates a crack team of Baby Corp employees to game plan solutions to the worst outcomes.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep42
programme.desc: Night Owls - Boss arranges a sleepover with Quiet Psycho Baby to get access to her father the Mayor's day planner, hoping to plant his own pro-baby agenda. However, staying up all night has the unexpected consequence of delusional over-tiredness! Tim sneaks into an art film and decides he has to be a grown-up now, so Mom and Dad try to "kid" him up again.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business Ep43
programme.desc: OCB - Boss' reign as CEO is threatened by a charming, multiple-dimpled Outside Consultant Baby (OCB) hired by the Board of Directors. Boss, furious that OCB will ruin Baby Corp with his poorly thought out ideas, tries to distract him while Staci adds the finishing touches to a project that will make OCB unnecessary, The 24 Hour Diaper.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants Ep15
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Frantic Fury of the Fearsome Furculees - Tired of the Melvins ruling the school, the boys realize that they need Mr. Krupp to make the school at least bearable. Unfortunately, Krupp has run off to Ecuador to look for a fabled fountain. So the boys form the M.I.S.F.A.R.T.S. - Mega Incredible Search Force Adventure Rescue Team Squad - to travel to Ecuador and bring Krupp back, whether he wants it or not.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep2
programme.desc: Guy Time - When Eep wants alone time with her new friend Dawn, Guy seeks a new friend of his own and finds an unlikely companion in Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep3
programme.desc: Game Nightmare - When the Bettermans invite the Croods to join their family game night, two things become clear: Phil needs to win and Grug hates to lose.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep14
programme.desc: Yi's LiLi-est Fan - While Everest is going through some typical teenager growing pains (not wanting to brush his teeth or tidy his room), a welcome distraction comes in the form of LiLi, an adorable nine-year-old whos positively obsessed with Yi, Everest, and the crews pursuits. When Everest doesnt return from a sweets-filled outing with LiLi, the crew discovers LiLis intentions might not have been so pure.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep15
programme.desc: Qilin-mania - Superstar-level mania sets in when the renowned and prosperity-brining creature Qilin appears in front of Yis building. In trying to protect Qilin from the mob of people hoping for their wishes to be granted, the crew is distraught when they lose track of the creature. Their distress grows upon discovering that this Qilin isnt an auspicious mythical creature at all but a nefarious robot sent by a mysterious figure.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep16
programme.desc: Shack Attack - "The crew tracks down the source of the havoc-wreaking robot Qilin and winds up trapped by Mr. Lung, the Minticon-using candymaker who disappeared in Season 1. While captive, Yi and the crew learn of a higher power known as the Great Watchers, and that Mr. Lung is furious at Yi for unwittingly replacing him as the GW-approved keeper of magical creatures. Saddled with these mind-blowing revelations, the crew must find a way to escape and stop Mr. Lung from using creature magic for evil."

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep12
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 1 - Tom and the riders go in search of Thunder and must face a gauntlet of dangerous dragons to find their lost friend. Along the way, Tom reveals his big secret to DAngelo and Alex.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep13
programme.desc: Follow the Lightning: Part 2 - Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: Dragons 9 Realms Ep14
programme.desc: Fire Escape - Tom hatches an unorthodox plan to use a monstrous Nightmare to test Alexs new fire suits that endangers the secret of dragons.

programme.desc: Captain Underpants And The Confusing Crisis Of The Conniving Captive - Melvin isn't exactly their friend ... but it's not like George and Harold can just let him be held captive by diabolical Biglyans, right? Right?!?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces its time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes shes got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City Ep14

programme.desc: It Flies in the Family - Eugene discovers the Lair and demands a dragon of his own.

programme.title: Dragons: Race To The Edge Ep6
programme.desc: Gone Gustav Gone - When Dagur the Deranged captures Gustav, it's up to Hiccup, Toothless and the Dragon Riders to get him back.

programme.title: Dragons: Riders Of Berk Ep12
programme.desc: Thawfest - Hiccup tries to best Snotlout during the Thaw Games, the Vikings annual sports competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Where'S Wally? Ep32
programme.desc: Mongolia-saurus - The Wanderers receive a WanderPost with some odd news from paleontologist, WIZARD AMBER: living dinosaurs are roaming around Mongolia! Odlulu and Fritz are using the DINO KEY to get the ultimate pets: real dinosaurs! So Wally and Wenda must use their dino-knowledge to wrangle these prehistoric animals before they overrun all of Mongolia.

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep19
programme.desc: That's Sooo Rob - Juliens former BFF, Rob, returns to lure the king away from his royal responsibilities and back to his crazy partying days.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep8
programme.desc: Mom Genes - When Grug takes Ugga hunting to find her inner growl again, she's as fierce as ever until coming face-to-face with a mom and baby too cute to catch.

programme.desc: Lucky And The Not-So-Secret Surprise - Lucky enlists Abigail Turo Snips and their horses to help plan a surprise birthday party for Pru that goes disastrously wrong

programme.desc: Garby - Just as Ty Rux welcomes Garby, a loud and smelly Stegarbasaurus, to the crater, Revvit disappears and the gang embarks on a dangerous rescue mission.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep12
programme.desc: Curse Of The Cicadas / Beat A Fajita - The snails accidentally wake a group of cicadas from their hibernation and after the bugs begin eating the town's food supply the snails go to extreme measures to rid the city of the /A celebrity chef steals Tito's taco recipe and challenges the FAST crew to a relay race against his own group of copycat racing snails.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S01 Ep117
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Observatory / The Crew Builds A Zipline - The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! // After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep63
programme.desc: Say Hello - Tinky Winky and Laa-Laa are in Home Dome when the Tubby Phone rings. It's Dipsy and Po calling from the Tubby Mobile to say 'Hello'.

programme.title: Yakka Dee S4 Ep3
programme.desc: Scooter - Dee encourages a friend to say 'scooter' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different scooters - a purple scooter, a blue scooter and a bopping scooter.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep30
programme.desc: Planet Pop Beam - The friends travel into outer space to visit Planet Popbeam. Mae-Mae wonders if the planet is made of cheese, but Phoebe thinks it's made of rock.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Messy's Pixel Power - How do pictures get onto a screen, and how does a cartoon get into your TV? When you need to know, go to OKIDO!

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep7
programme.desc: Unicorse - Bluey can't get to sleep, so Mum reads her one last story. But they are interrupted by Unicorse, the most annoying hand puppet in the world, whom Bluey tries to reform.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Mini Bluey - When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep3
programme.desc: The Transport Badge - When Duggee's old friend Rhodri goes home after a visit, he forgets his favourite hat. The Squirrels take an epic journey to give it back.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep2
programme.desc: The Face Painting Badge - The Squirrels are looking for Duggee but can't find him. Instead, they find someone who looks like Enid, only much too big. Duggee has painted his face to look like Enid!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Frog Song - It's fun on the counting train until Naughty Monkey starts to drive! Ethel makes a shape, Frog drops beats with a ribbit song, and Enid turns into anime to chase after a mouse.

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep4
programme.desc: What's Hot? - Billy and the Sillies introduce a visit to chicken A&E, the Squirrels build a bug house, Norrie has her chance to shine, and the Penguins give facts about what's hot and what's not.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo - The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Magic Xylophone - As Bluey and Bingo squabble over their magic xylophone, Dad seizes control and freezes Bluey, leaving Bingo as her only hope.

programme.title: Bluey S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Featherwand - Bluey and Mum are off to Chloe's party and Bingo isn't invited. But armed with a magic featherwand that makes things incredibly heavy, Bingo can now stop them leaving the house.

programme.title: Andy's Baby Animal Missions S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Andy and the Blue Duck Chicks - In this episode Andy, Jen and Scout head to New Zealand on a baby animal mission to help rescue a family of blue ducks and their chicks from a fast flowing river. Along the way, Andy takes a ride on a pukeko chick and meets a hedgehog.

programme.title: Dog Squad S3 Ep1
programme.desc: Mission: Transport Museum - Kika and her family are on a day out to the Woofton Transport Museum. But when their new audio guide starts malfunctioning, Kika needs her super-sight to find the curator.

programme.title: Aneeshwar and Lizzie Go Wild S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Sun Bear and Rainbow Lorikeet - Aneeshwar and Lizzie meet two amazing animals and reveal a connection between them in the wild. This time, it's the sun bear and the rainbow lorikeet.

programme.title: Swashbuckle S8 Ep1
programme.desc: Captain Captain - The Musical - In this episode Captain Captain has just finished writing her musical theatre masterpiece called Captain Captain - The Musical! Written by and starring herself, with Sandy and Seaweed!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep17
programme.desc: The Camping Badge - Duggee and the squirrels are going camping and they hear a scary noise outside the tent!

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep16
programme.desc: The Medicine Badge - Duggee's not very well, he's lost his voice. The Squirrels want to make him feel better. Duggee tries to tell them that he needs some water but the Squirrels don't quite understand, so they ask all the other animals for advice. Does anyone have the answer?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep15
programme.desc: The Pizza Badge - The Squirrels help Duggee try out his new outdoor pizza oven. Duggee makes the bases, then the Squirrels each put on all the toppings they like best. Some of their combinations are... interesting!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep35
programme.desc: The Great Pacific Garbage Patch - When a storm washes up plastic litter onto the Academy beach, the Go Jetters leave Ubercorn, Grandmaster Glitch and the cadets behind and head to the North Pacific Ocean in Jet Pad.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep34
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Mudslide - It's a very rainy day at the Go Jet Academy and the Go Jetters are teaching the Cadets some crucial Go Jetter skills.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends S23 Ep9
programme.desc: Diesel Do Right - After being scolded for making a mistake, Diesel plays a trick on Rebecca to try and get the other engines in trouble.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Beach Break - Sarah & Duck are spending a day at the beach, aiming to build some sand animals.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Bubble Bumbling - The Bubble Man is in town so a visit to the Big Shop is in order for Sarah, Duck and Donkey.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep17
programme.desc: Stuck - Stanley has to free Myrtle, who is stuck, using his new tunnelling mole machine so she can attend the schools tree planting day.

programme.title: Stan Can S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Sofa - Stanley has to fix Myrtles wobbly sofa so her and her friends can watch Fred and Fifi on the Boogie Woogie Dance Show together. He ends up creating a super-duper special sofa.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep74
programme.desc: Purple Zappa - Monty gets a new toy robot and wonders whether it is better to keep it shiny and clean in the box or to have fun playing with it.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S3 Ep23
programme.desc: It's Time for a Harvest Festival - JoJo and Gran Gran join Julie at the farm for the harvest festival. Julie gives JoJo, Gran Gran and their friends a special tractor ride to the harvesting field, where there's lots for everyone to do.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep27
programme.desc: Musical Statues - At the end of a long day, Bluey and her family are out of sync and out of sorts, so Mum gets everyone to play musical statues.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep28
programme.desc: Stories - Indy thinks she's no good because her model horse looks like a cow, but Calypso encourages her not to give up, so she tries to fix it with a little help from Winton.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep29
programme.desc: Puppets - Bluey and Bingo teach Unicorse good manners so he can ask Mum on a date, but things go awry when Unicorse eats a tick.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep20
programme.desc: The Yoga Badge - The squirrels have arrived and they're all a little bit hyped up with bundles of energy. Things are starting to get a bit frantic, and Duggee needs to calm them all down. Fortunately, he has his Yoga Badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S2 Ep19
programme.desc: The River Badge - Duggee has a package that needs delivering right at the other end of the river, and a long way from the clubhouse. It looks like the squirrels are going to have a day out on the boat. Good job Duggee has his River badge!

programme.title: Hey Duggee's Squirrel Club S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Campfire Choir - Today at Squirrel Club, there are all sorts of comparisons to learn - from small to smallest, hungry to hungriest, and Duggee to Duggiest!

programme.title: Go Jetters S3 Ep14
programme.desc: Mountain Gorillas, The Democratic Republic of the Congo - The Go Jetters race to save a family of mountain gorillas from traps left by hunters and also from a sneezy Grandmaster Glitch's germs.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Garlic - Fitness guru, Garlic, has a set of fun exercises to make you stronger.

programme.title: Roots & Fruits S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Avocado - The fabulous Avocados sing an operatic piece in their three unique voices.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep17
programme.desc: The Good, the Bad and the Prickly - Prickly Pear arrives in the Supermarket and tries to take over Evil Pea's freezer. Supertato discovers that Prickly Pear isn't mean at all and just needed some good friends.

programme.title: Supertato S1 Ep18
programme.desc: The Great Book Rescue - Evil Pea takes all the books from the Supermarket. Supertato, Chilli and Carrot try to rescue all the books by using acrobatic skills they learnt from their favourite circus book.

programme.desc: Letters from a Chechen Prison - Zarema and Her Rebel Family - The story of Zarema, kidnapped and imprisoned in Chechnya for defending human rights. Nine years in a penal colony: That is the sentence Zarema Musayeva has to serve because her sons rebelled against Chechen ruler Ramzan Kadyrov. Zaremas family is doing everything they can to ensure she is not forgotten.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 - 5

programme.title: Noche UFC: Lopes vs. Silva - Prelims
programme.desc: The third-annual Noche UFC event has landed at Frost Bank Center in San Antonio, Texas, on September 14, and fight fans in the Lone Star State will be treated to one of the most highly antcipated bouts of 2025 when featherweight contenders Diego Lopes and Jean Silva clash in the five-round main event. Fighting out of his adopted home of Puebla, Mexico, Lopes owns wins over Brian Ortega and Dan Ige, and following his five-round war with Alexander Volkanovski, hes eager to return against The Fighting Nerds Silva, a supreme finisher who has ended all five of his UFC victories before the final horn.
